Kabbalah

sth pleasant, attractive or satisfactory, or to enjoy sth.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均含喜欢、喜爱某事物之义。</chn></und></p><ul eid="like_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a21"><li eid="like_li_5" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a22" e_inline="y"><unsyn>like</unsyn> <und margined="n">to find sth pleasant, attractive or satisfactory; to enjoy sth<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指喜欢、喜爱</chn>：</und><x-gs sth</unsyn> <und margined="n">to like or enjoy sth, especially sth you have liked or enjoyed for a long time<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指喜爱（尤指已爱上很长时间的事物）</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="like_xgs_26" status="3">She adores working with children.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>她热爱参与儿童工作。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="like_h3_1" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a43" e_inline="y" tranID="18" status="6">love or adore?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 love 还是 adore？</chn></h3><ul eid="like_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a44"><li eid="like_li_10" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a45" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Adore</eb>  is more informal than  <eb>love</eb>, and is used to express a stronger feeling.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>adore 较 love 非正式，用以表达更强烈的感情。</chn></und></li></ul><h3 eid="like_h3_2" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a48" e_inline="y" tranID="26" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="like_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a49"><li eid="like_li_11" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a4a" e_inline="y"><und </und></li><li eid="like_li_13" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a4e" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">to like/love sth  <eb>very much</eb> </und></li><li eid="like_li_14" e_id="13cbabf992f.7a50" e_inline="y"><und keep/hold (yourself) aloof

keep/leave your options open

keep out (of sth)
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g eid="keep_pvg_29"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-3cb8" eid="keep_pv_31"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-3cb8">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-3cb8" eid="keep_pv_31"><xhtml:a href="xp:keep">ˌkeep</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:out">ˈout</xhtml:a> (<xhtml:a href="xp:of">of</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:sth">sth</xhtml:a>)</pv> <xhtml:a href="help:keypart"><symbol type="key">🔑</symbol></xhtml:a></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="keep_sngs_47"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="keep_sng_52" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:not">not</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:enter">enter</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:place">place</xhtml:a>; keep sb after

keep sb↔back (from sb/sth)

keep sth quiet

keep sth↔down

keep the flag flying

</chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>代表自己的国家（或组织）</chn></def><x-gs eid="flag_xgs_4"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabdc422.-2b40" eid="flag_xg_10"><xsymb><xhtml:a keep up (with sb/sth)
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g eid="keep_pvg_37"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-3c51" eid="keep_pv_40"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-3c51">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-3c51" eid="keep_pv_40"><xhtml:a managed to keep myself from falling."><xhtml:a href="x:I">I</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:just">just</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:managed">managed</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a <xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>我差一点儿没摔倒。</chn></x><a href="snd://_keep__gbs_44.spx"><audio-gb-liju>🔊</audio-gb-liju></a><xaudio eid="keep_xaudio_98" geo="n_am" name="_keep__ams_44"></xaudio></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://keep">keep</a></div>
</>

<xhtml:a href="d:purpose">purpose</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>使某人（或某事）适合于某事</chn></def><xr-gs firstinblock="n" xt="syn"><xrlabel> <xhtml:a href="helpxr:syn"><boxtag>SYN</boxtag></xhtml:a> </xrlabel><xr-g-blk><xr-g e_targeteltid="13cbabe3564.-4229"><xh-blk><xh><a href="entry://gear">gear</a></xh></xh-blk></xr-g></xr-g-blk> </xr-gs><x-gs eid="key_xgs_7"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-373d" eid="key_xg_15"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabf992f.-373d">◆</xhtml:a></xsymb><rx e eid="key_rxg_9" g href="key_rxg_9" resource="recx" e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.1f34c209.141c12ef5c9.6058" e_inline="y" eid="key_x_21" status="6" tranid="37" wd="His contribution could be key."><xhtml:a href="x:His">His</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="snd://_key__ams_9.spx"><audio-ams-liju>🔊</audio-ams-liju></a></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs><unbox type="synonyms" Name="main" eid="main_unbox_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-326"><body eid="main_body_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-325"><title eid="main_h1_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-324" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="44" status="1">main</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">major</und> ◇ <und margined="n">key</und> ◇ <und margined="n">central</und> ◇ <und margined="n">principal</und> ◇ <und margined="n">chief</und> ◇ <und margined="n">prime</und></inlinelist><p eid="main_p_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-31c" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These words all describe sb/sth that is the largest or most important of its kind.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均用以形容主要的、最重要的人或事物。</chn></und></p><ul eid="main_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac01393.-31b"><li eid="main_li_7" e_id="13cbac01393.-31a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>main</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> largest or most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指主要的、最重要的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_2" e_id="13cbac01393.-318"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_7" e_id="13cbac01393.-316" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">Be careful crossing the main road.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>过大马路时小心点。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_8" e_id="13cbac01393.-314" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">The main thing is to remain calm.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>最重要的是要保持冷静。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="main_li_8" e_id="13cbac01393.-313" e_inline="y"><unsyn>major</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:ubn">usually before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> very large or important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指主要的、重要的、大的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_3" e_id="13cbac01393.-311"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_9" e_id="13cbac01393.-30f" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">He played a major role in setting up the system.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>他在建立这个系统的过程中起了主要的作用。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-30e"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Major</eb>  is most often used after <ei eid="main_ei_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-30c">a</ei> with a singular noun, or no article with a plural noun. When it is used with <ei eid="main_ei_2" e_id="13cbac01393.-30b">the</ei> or <ei eid="main_ei_3" e_id="13cbac01393.-30a">my/your/his/her/our/their</ei> it means 'the largest or most important'.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>major 最常用于不定冠词 a 之后，与单数名词连用；或不用冠词，与复数名词连用。major 与 the 或 my/your/his/her/our/their 连用时意为最主要的、最重要的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_4" e_id="13cbac01393.-309"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_10" e_id="13cbac01393.-307" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">Our major concern here is combatting poverty.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>在这里我们最关心的是解决贫穷问题。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"> In this meaning it is only used to talk about ideas or worries that people have, not physical things, and it is also more formal than  <eb>main</eb>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>在该含义中 major 只用以指人的想法或担忧，而非物质的东西，且较 main 正式</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_5" e_id="13cbac01393.-305"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><wx eid="main_wx_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-303">Be careful crossing the major road.</wx></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><wx eid="main_wx_2" e_id="13cbac01393.-301">The major thing is to remain calm.</wx></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="main_li_9" e_id="13cbac01393.-300" e_inline="y"><unsyn>key</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:ubn">usually before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g> most important; essential<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指最重要的、主要的、关键的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_6" e_id="13cbac01393.-2fe"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_11" e_id="13cbac01393.-2fc" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">He was a key figure in the campaign.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>他是这场运动的关键人物。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-2fb"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Key</eb>  is used most frequently in business and political contexts. It can be used to talk about ideas, or the part that sb plays in a situation, but not physical things. It is slightly more informal than  <eb>major</eb>, especially when used after a noun and linking verb.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>key 最常用于商务和政治语境，可用来形容想法或某人在某情势下起的作用，而非物质的东西。key 较 major 稍非正式，用于名词加连系动词后尤其如此</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_7" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f8"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_14"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_12" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f6" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">Speed is key at this point.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>在这个时候速度是关键。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="main_li_10" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f5" e_inline="y"><unsyn>central</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指最重要的、首要的、主要的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_8" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f2"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_15"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_13" e_id="13cbac01393.-2f0" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">The central issue is that of widespread racism.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>最重要的问题是种族主义泛滥。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ef"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag>  <eb>Central</eb>  is used in a similar way to  <eb>key</eb>, but is more formal. It is most frequently used in the phrase <ei eid="main_ei_5" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ec">sth is central to sth else</ei>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>central 与 key 用法相似，但更正式，最常用于 be central to 短语中。</chn></un></li><li eid="main_li_11" e_id="13cbac01393.-2eb" e_inline="y"><unsyn>principal</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指最重要的、主要的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_9" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e8"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_16"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_14" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e6" e_inline="y" tranID="22" status="6">The principal reason for this omission is lack of time.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>跳过它的主要原因是时间不足。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><un un="note" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e5"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Principal</eb>  is mostly used for statements of fact about which there can be no argument. To state an opinion, or to try to persuade sb of the facts as you see them, it is more usual to use  <eb>key</eb>  or  <eb>central</eb>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>principal 主要用于陈述无可争辩的事实。表明意见或说服别人相信你所见到的事实，较常用 key 或 central</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_10" e_id="13cbac01393.-2e1"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_17"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_15" e_id="13cbac01393.-2df" e_inline="y" tranID="24" status="6">The key/central issue here is…<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>这里的关键问题是…</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="main_li_12" e_id="13cbac01393.-2de" e_inline="y"><unsyn>chief</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指最重要的、首要的、主要的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_11" e_id="13cbac01393.-2db"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_18"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_16" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d9" e_inline="y" tranID="26" status="6">Unemployment was the chief cause of poverty.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>失业是贫穷的主要原因。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="main_li_13" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d8" e_inline="y"><unsyn>prime</unsyn> <und margined="n"><gram-g><gram-blk> [<gram e_id=""><xhtml:a href="helpgr:obn">only before noun</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> most important; to be considered first<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指主要的、首要的</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="main_xgs_12" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d5"><x-g-blk eid="main_xg_19"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="main_x_17" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d3" e_inline="y" tranID="28" status="6">My prime concern is to protect my property.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我最关心的是保护自己的财产。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="main_h3_1" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d2" e_inline="y" tranID="54" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="main_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d1"><li eid="main_li_14" e_id="13cbac01393.-2d0" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a/the main/major/key/central/principal/chief/prime  <eb>aim/concern</eb> </und></li><li eid="main_li_15" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ce" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a/the main/major/principal  <eb>road/town/city</eb> </und></li><li eid="main_li_16" e_id="13cbac01393.-2cc" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">the main/key  <eb>thing</eb>  is to…</und></li><li eid="main_li_17" e_id="13cbac01393.-2ca" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">to be  <eb>of</eb>  major/key/central/prime  <eb>importance</eb> </und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs></subentry-g></div>
</>
keyboard

e_inline="y"><titled tranID="29" status="1">start</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">begin</und> ◇ <und margined="n">start off</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kick off</und> ◇ <und happening from the beginning, or people doing the first part of sth.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均用以指事情开始发生或开始做某事。</chn></und></p><ul eid="start_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac4af93.-6049"><li start 还是 begin？</chn></h3><p eid="start_p_2" e_id="13cbac4af93.-603d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">There is not much difference in meaning between these words.  <eb>Start</eb>  is more frequent in spoken English and in business contexts;  <eb>begin</eb>  is more frequent in written English and is often used when you are describing a series of events.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>上述两词在意义上无多大差别，start 较常用于口语和商业语境中，begin 较常用于书面语中，描述一系列事情</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="start_xgs_28" e_id="13cbac4af93.-603a"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_66"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="start_x_66" e_id="13cbac4af93.-6038" e_inline="y" speaking'.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>start 不用以指开始讲话</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="start_xgs_29" e_id="13cbac4af93.-6036"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_67"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><wx eid="start_wx_1" </label-g-blk> to start happening or doing sth; to start by doing or being sth<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指进行或开展起来、首先进行、一开始是</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="start_xgs_30" e_id="13cbac4af93.-602f"><x-g-blk kick against sth

kick back

kick drum

<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-324d" eid="kick_pvg_7"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-324b" eid="kick_pv_7"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-324b">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-324b" eid="kick_pv_7"><xhtml:a href="xp:kick">ˌkick</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:off">ˈoff</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kick_sngs_19"><sn-blk shcut="n"><xhtml:ol start="1"><xhtml:li><licontent><sn-g eid="kick_sng_24" href="d:game">game</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:team">team</xhtml:a>, <xhtml:a href="d:etc">etc</xhtml:a>. <eb-blk> <eb><xhtml:a href="d:kicks">kicks</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:off">off</xhtml:a></eb></eb-blk>, <xhtml:a href="d:the">the</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:game">game</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:starts">starts</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（足球比赛等）开球，开始</chn></def><xr-gs firstinblock="n" xt="rn"><xrlabel>  <arrow>➡</arrow>  related noun </xrlabel><xr-g-blk><xr-g e_targeteltid="13cbabf992f.-310a"><xh-blk><xh><a href="entry://kick-off">kick-off</a></xh></xh-blk></xr-g></xr-g-blk> </xr-gs><unbox e_id="13cbac4af93.-6053" eid="start_unbox_1" name="start" type="synonyms"><body e_id="13cbac4af93.-6052" eid="start_body_1"><title e_id="13cbac4af93.-6051" e_inline="y" eid="start_h1_1"><titled status="1" tranid="29">start</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">begin</und> ◇ <und margined="n">start off</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kick off</und> ◇ <und margined="n">commence</und> ◇ <und margined="n">open</und></inlinelist><p e_id="13cbac4af93.-604a" e_inline="y" eid="start_p_1"><und margined="n">These words are all used to talk about things happening from the beginning, or people doing the first part of sth.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均用以指事情开始发生或开始做某事。</chn></und></p><ul class="deflist" e_id="13cbac4af93.-6049" eid="start_ul_2"><li e_id="13cbac4af93.-6048" e_inline="y" eid="start_li_6"><unsyn>start</unsyn> <und margined="n"> to begin to happen or exist; to begin in a particular way or from a particular point<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指开始发生或存在、以…开始、以…为起点</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-6046" eid="start_xgs_26"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_64"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-6044" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_64" status="6" tranid="5">When does the class start?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>什么时候上课？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li e_id="13cbac4af93.-6043" e_inline="y" eid="start_li_7"><unsyn>begin</unsyn> <und margined="n"> to start to happen or exist; to start in a particular way or from a particular point; to start speaking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指开始发生或存在、以…开始、以…为起点、开始讲话</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-6041" eid="start_xgs_27"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_65"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-603f" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_65" status="6" tranid="7">When does the concert begin?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>音乐会什么时候开始？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 e_id="13cbac4af93.-603e" e_inline="y" eid="start_h3_1" status="6" tranid="8">start or begin?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 start 还是 begin？</chn></h3><p e_id="13cbac4af93.-603d" e_inline="y" eid="start_p_2"><und margined="n">There is not much difference in meaning between these words.  <eb>Start</eb>  is more frequent in spoken English and in business contexts;  <eb>begin</eb>  is more frequent in written English and is often used when you are describing a series of events.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>上述两词在意义上无多大差别，start 较常用于口语和商业语境中，begin 较常用于书面语中，描述一系列事情</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-603a" eid="start_xgs_28"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_66"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-6038" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_66" status="6" tranid="10">The story begins on the island of Corfu.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>故事从科孚岛开始。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"> <eb>Start</eb>  is not used to mean 'begin speaking'.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>start 不用以指开始讲话</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-6036" eid="start_xgs_29"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_67"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><wx e_id="13cbac4af93.-6034" eid="start_wx_1">'Ladies and gentlemen,' he started.</wx></x-g-blk></x-gs></p><ul class="deflist" e_id="13cbac4af93.-6033" eid="start_ul_3"><li e_id="13cbac4af93.-6032" e_inline="y" eid="start_li_8"><unsyn>start off</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> to start happening or doing sth; to start by doing or being sth<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指进行或开展起来、首先进行、一开始是</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-602f" eid="start_xgs_30"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_68"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-602d" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_67" status="6" tranid="13">The discussion started off mildly enough.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>讨论颇为温和地开展起来。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li e_id="13cbac4af93.-602c" e_inline="y" eid="start_li_9"><unsyn>kick off</unsyn> <und margined="n"><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> to start an event or activity, especially in a particular way; (of an event, activity, etc.) to start, especially in a particular way<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>尤指以…开始（活动）、（活动）以…开始</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-6029" eid="start_xgs_31"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_69"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-6027" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_68" status="6" tranid="15">Tom will kick off with a few comments.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>汤姆讲话时要先发表几点意见。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_70"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-6025" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_69" status="6" tranid="17">The festival kicks off on Monday, September 13.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>节期从 9 月 13 日星期一开始。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li e_id="13cbac4af93.-6024" e_inline="y" eid="start_li_10"><unsyn>commence</unsyn> <und margined="n"><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> to start happening<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指开始发生</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-6021" eid="start_xgs_32"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_71"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-601f" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_70" status="6" tranid="19">The meeting is scheduled to commence at noon.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>会议定于午间召开。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li e_id="13cbac4af93.-601e" e_inline="y" eid="start_li_11"><unsyn>open</unsyn> <und margined="n"> to start an event or activity in a particular way; (of an event, a film/movie or a book) to start, especially in a particular way<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指以…开始（活动）、（活动、电影或书）以…开头／开篇</chn>：</und><x-gs e_id="13cbac4af93.-601c" eid="start_xgs_33"><x-g-blk eid="start_xg_72"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbac4af93.-601a" e_inline="y" eid="start_x_71" status="6" tranid="21">The story opens with a murder.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>故事以一宗谋杀案作序幕。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 e_id="13cbac4af93.-6019" e_inline="y" eid="start_h3_2" status="1" tranid="35">Patterns</h3><ul class="bullet" kick off (with sth)

kick out (at sb/sth)
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g eid="kick_pvg_11"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-3217" eid="kick_pv_11"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-3217">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-3217" eid="kick_pv_11"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:try">try</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:hit">hit</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a>/<xhtml:a </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（因气愤或心烦意乱）用脚踢（人或物）</chn></def></sn-g></licontent></xhtml:li></xhtml:ol></sn-blk><sn-blk shcut="n"><xhtml:ol start="2"><xhtml:li><licontent><sn-g eid="kick_sng_30" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:react">react</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:violently">violently</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（对令人气愤或烦恼的人或事）作出强烈反应</chn></def></sn-g></licontent></xhtml:li></xhtml:ol></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a </>

kick-start
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><div class="cixing_tiaozhuan"><div class="cixing_tiaozhuan_part"><a href="#verb">verb</a>,</div><div class="cixing_tiaozhuan_part"><a href="#noun">noun</a></div></div><div id="verb" with disputes by kicking them into the long grass." itemid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-65ea7b53.14b857c79e7.79e4" type="x" word="by"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="x:by">by</xhtml:a> <ftindex context="He tends to deal with disputes by kicking them into the long grass." itemid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-65ea7b53.14b857c79e7.79e4" type="x" word="kicking"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="x:kicking">kicking</xhtml:a> <ftindex context="He tends to deal with disputes by kicking them into the long grass." itemid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-65ea7b53.14b857c79e7.79e4" type="x" word="them"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="x:them">them</xhtml:a> <ftindex context="He tends to deal with disputes by kicking them into the long grass." itemid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-65ea7b53.14b857c79e7.79e4" type="x" word="into"></ftindex><xhtml:a kick-turn

kick up
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-3209" eid="kick_pvg_13"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-3207" eid="kick_pv_13"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-3207">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-3207" eid="kick_pv_13"><xhtml:a href="xp:kick">ˌkick</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:up">ˈup</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kick_sngs_25"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="kick_sng_32" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo e_id="13cbabf992f.-3203" geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>(<dis-g><dtxt e_inline="y" eid="kick_dtxt_2" status="6" tranid="51"><xhtml:a href="d:of">of</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:wind">wind</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:storm">storm</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>风或风暴</chn></dtxt></dis-g>) <def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:become">become</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:stronger">stronger</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>越来越强；逐渐加强</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://kick">kick</a></div>
</>
kick up a fuss, stink, etc.
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-32c5" eid="kick_idmg_8"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-32c3" eid="kick_idm_8"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-32c3">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-32c3" eid="kick_idm_8"><xhtml:a href="xi:kick">kick</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:up">up</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:fuss">ˈfuss</xhtml:a>, <xhtml:a href="xi:stink">ˈstink</xhtml:a>, <xhtml:a href="xi:etc">etc</xhtml:a>.</idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kick_sngs_9"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="kick_sng_12" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-32bf" reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:complain">complain</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:loudly">loudly</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:about">about</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sth">sth</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>吵闹；闹事；起哄</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://kick">kick</a></div>
</>
kick up your heels
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-32ba" eid="kick_idmg_9"><top-g><idm-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-32b8" eid="kick_idm_9"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addid:13cbabf992f.-32b8">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><idm e_id="13cbabf992f.-32b8" eid="kick_idm_9"><ftindex context="kick up your ˈheels" itemid="13cbabf992f.-32b8" type="id" word="kick"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="xi:kick">kick</xhtml:a> <ftindex context="kick up your ˈheels" itemid="13cbabf992f.-32b8" type="id" word="up"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="xi:up">up</xhtml:a> <ftindex context="kick up your ˈheels" itemid="13cbabf992f.-32b8" type="id" word="your"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="xi:your">your</xhtml:a> <ftindex context="kick up your ˈheels" itemid="13cbabf992f.-32b8" type="id" word="ˈheels"></ftindex><xhtml:a href="xi:heels">ˈheels</xhtml:a></idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kick_sngs_10"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="kick_sng_13" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-32b4" reg="infml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:infml">informal</xhtml:a></reg>, </reg-blk><geo-blk> <geo e_id="13cbabf992f.-32b3" geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:be">be</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:relaxed">relaxed</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:and">and</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:enjoy">enjoy</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:yourself">yourself</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzindex contents="轻轻松松；尽情享乐" encontext="" type="d"></fthzindex>轻轻松松；尽情享乐</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://heel">heel</a></div>
</>
kick your heels

kid

eid="crime_h2_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b73" e_inline="y" tranID="1" status="6">Committing a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪</chn></h2><ul eid="crime_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b74"><li eid="crime_li_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b75" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>commit</eb>  a crime/a murder/a violent assault/a brutal killing/an armed robbery/fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪／谋杀罪／暴力侵犯他人身体罪／残杀罪／持械抢劫罪／诈骗罪</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_2" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b77" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be involved in</eb>  terrorism/a suspected arson attack/people smuggling/human trafficking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>参与恐怖主义活动；涉嫌纵火袭击；参与人口走私／人口贩卖</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_3" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b79" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>engage/participate in</eb>  criminal activity/illegal practices/acts of mindless vandalism<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>参与犯罪活动／非法活动／愚昧的故意毁坏他人财产的行为</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_4" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b7b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>steal</eb>  sb's wallet/purse/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> mobile phone/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> cell phone<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>偷某人的钱包／手机</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_5" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b81" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>rob</eb>  a bank/a person/a tourist<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>抢劫银行／他人／游客</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_6" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b83" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>break into/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>burgle/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>burglarize</eb>  a house/a home/an apartment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>入室盗窃</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_7" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>hijack</eb>  a plane/ship/bus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>劫持飞机／轮船／公共汽车</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_8" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>smuggle</eb>  drugs/weapons/arms/immigrants<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>走私毒品／武器／军火；偷运移民</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_9" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>launder</eb>  drug money (through sth)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>（通过…）洗毒资</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_10" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b91" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>forge </eb>  documents/certificates/passports<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>伪造文件／证件／护照</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_11" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b93" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>take/accept/pay sb/offer (sb)</eb>  a bribe<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>索取／收受贿赂；向（某人）行贿</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_12" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b95" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>run</eb>  a phishing/an email/an Internet scam<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>进行网络钓鱼／电子邮件／互联网诈骗</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="crime_h2_2" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b97" e_inline="y" tranID="14" status="6">Fighting crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>打击犯罪</chn></h2><ul eid="crime_ul_2" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b98"><li eid="crime_li_13" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b99" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>combat/fight</eb>  crime/terrorism/corruption/drug criminals/burglars/thieves/shoplifters/vandals<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>威慑／阻止犯罪分子／入室盗窃者／小偷／商店扒手／故意破坏公物者</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_16" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> killjoy
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="killjoy_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-2ca7">kill·joy</h><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-2ca5"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-2ca4"></infl><pron e eid="killjoy_prongs_1" gs href="killjoy_prongs_1" psg="ald8_killjoy_prongs_1" resource="phonetics" source="ald8" targeteltid="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.65a4283b.1430b409f97.-20a3" wd="killjoy"><pron-g-blk><brelabel><xhtml:a href="help:bre">BrE</xhtml:a></brelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈkɪldʒɔɪ</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="killjoy_audio_1" name="killjoy__gb_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://killjoy__gb_1.spx"><audio-gb>🔊</audio-gb></a></pron-g-blk><pron-g-blk><xhtml:br></xhtml:br><namelabel><xhtml:a href="help:name">NAmE</xhtml:a></namelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈkɪldʒɔɪ</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="killjoy_audio_2" name="killjoy__us_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://killjoy__us_1.spx"><audio-us>🔊</audio-us></a></pron-g-blk></pron-gs><pos-g eid="killjoy_posg_1"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:n">noun</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g><label-g-blk> (<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-2c9e" reg="disappro"><xhtml:a href="helpr:disappro">disapproving</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="killjoy_sngs_1"><sn-blk-nolist><sn-g eid="killjoy_sng_1"><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:person">person</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:who">who</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:likes">likes</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:spoil">spoil</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:other">other</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:people's">people's</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:enjoyment">enjoyment</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>使人扫兴的人；大煞风景的人</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs></h-g>

kill or cure

eid="crime_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b70"><body eid="crime_body_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b71"><title eid="crime_h1_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b72" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="34" status="2">Crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪</chn></titled></title><h2 eid="crime_h2_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b73" e_inline="y" tranID="1" status="6">Committing a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪</chn></h2><ul eid="crime_ul_1" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b74"><li eid="crime_li_1" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b75" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>commit</eb>  a crime/a murder/a violent assault/a brutal killing/an armed robbery/fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪／谋杀罪／暴力侵犯他人身体罪／残杀罪／持械抢劫罪／诈骗罪</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_2" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b77" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>be involved in</eb>  terrorism/a suspected arson attack/people smuggling/human trafficking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>参与恐怖主义活动；涉嫌纵火袭击；参与人口走私／人口贩卖</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_3" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b79" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>engage/participate in</eb>  criminal activity/illegal practices/acts of mindless vandalism<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>参与犯罪活动／非法活动／愚昧的故意毁坏他人财产的行为</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_4" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b7b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>steal</eb>  sb's wallet/purse/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> mobile phone/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> cell phone<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>偷某人的钱包／手机</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_5" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b81" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>rob</eb>  a bank/a person/a tourist<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>抢劫银行／他人／游客</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_6" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b83" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>break into/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>burgle/</eb>  <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk>  <eb>burglarize</eb>  a house/a home/an apartment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>入室盗窃</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_7" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>hijack</eb>  a plane/ship/bus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>劫持飞机／轮船／公共汽车</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_8" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>smuggle</eb>  drugs/weapons/arms/immigrants<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>走私毒品／武器／军火；偷运移民</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_9" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>launder</eb>  drug money (through sth)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>（通过…）洗毒资</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_10" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b91" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>forge </eb>  documents/certificates/passports<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>伪造文件／证件／护照</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_11" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b93" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>take/accept/pay sb/offer (sb)</eb>  a bribe<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>索取／收受贿赂；向（某人）行贿</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_12" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b95" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>run</eb>  a phishing/an email/an Internet scam<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>进行网络钓鱼／电子邮件／互联网诈骗</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="crime_h2_2" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b97" e_inline="y" tranID="14" status="6">Fighting crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>打击犯罪</chn></h2><ul eid="crime_ul_2" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b98"><li eid="crime_li_13" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b99" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>combat/fight</eb>  crime/terrorism/corruption/drug trafficking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>打击犯罪／恐怖主义／腐败／贩毒</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_14" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>prevent/stop</eb>  credit-card fraud/child abuse/software piracy<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>防止／阻止信用卡诈骗／虐待儿童／软件盗版</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_15" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>deter/stop</eb>  criminals/burglars/thieves/shoplifters/vandals<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>威慑／阻止犯罪分子／入室盗窃者／小偷／商店扒手／故意破坏公物者</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_16" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>reduce/tackle/crack down on</eb>  knife/gun/violent/street crime/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> antisocial behaviour<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>减少／处理／严厉打击持刀／持枪／暴力／街头犯罪／反社会行为</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_17" e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba3" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>foil</eb>  a bank raid/a terrorist plot<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>挫败一起银行抢劫案／一次恐怖分子的阴谋</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_18" e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba5" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>help/support/protect </eb>  the victims of crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>帮助／支持／保护犯罪活动的受害者</chn></und></li></ul><h2 eid="crime_h2_3" e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba7" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">Investigating crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>调查犯罪活动</chn></h2><ul eid="crime_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba8"><li eid="crime_li_19" e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>report</eb>  a crime/a theft/a rape/an attack/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> an incident to the police<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>向警方举报不法行为／偷窃案／强奸案／袭击事件／暴力事件</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_20" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bad" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>witness</eb>  the crime/attack/murder/incident<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>目击犯罪／袭击／谋杀／暴力事件</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_21" e_id="13cbabc0139.6baf" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>investigate</eb>  a murder/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a homicide/a burglary/a robbery/the alleged incident<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>调查谋杀案／蓄意杀人案／入室盗窃案／抢劫案／涉嫌的暴力事件</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_22" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bb3" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>conduct/launch/pursue</eb>  an investigation (into…)/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a police/murder inquiry<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>进行／开始／继续（对…的）调查／警方调查／谋杀案调查</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bb7" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>investigate/reopen</eb>  a criminal/murder case<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>调查／重新审理犯罪／谋杀案件</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_24" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bb9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>examine/investigate/find fingerprints at</eb>  the crime scene/the scene of crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>仔细检查／调查／查找犯罪现场的指纹</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_25" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bbb" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>collect/gather</eb>  forensic evidence<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>收集法医证据</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_26" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bbd" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>uncover</eb>  new evidence/a fraud/a scam/a plot/a conspiracy/political corruption/a cache of weapons<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>发现新证据／诈骗／欺诈／密谋／阴谋／政治腐败／私藏武器</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_27" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bbf" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>describe/identify</eb>  a suspect/the culprit/the perpetrator/the assailant/the attacker<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>描述／指认嫌疑犯／罪犯／作恶者／攻击者／袭击者</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_28" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bc1" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>question/interrogate</eb>  a suspect/witness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>询问嫌疑人／目击证人</chn></und></li><li eid="crime_li_29" e_id="13cbabc0139.6bc3" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>solve/crack</eb>  the case<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>破案</chn></und></li></ul><xr-gs xt="collocat"><xrhead> <arrow>➡</arrow> <xrbold><b>collocations</b></xrbold> at</xrhead><xr-g-blk><xr-g> <xh><xhtml:a href="xid:13cbabf992f.-486c">justice</xhtml:a></xh></xr-g></xr-g-blk></xr-gs></body></unbox></sn-gs></idm-g></id-g></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs></h-g>
</>

kinder

</xr-gs></sn-g></licontent></xhtml:li></xhtml:ol></sn-blk></sn-gs></h-g>
</>

eid="kirsch_resg_1"></res-g><gram-g eid="kirsch_gramg_1"><gram-blk> [<gram><xhtml:a href="helpgr:u">uncountable</xhtml:a></gram></gram-blk><gram-blk>, <gram><xhtml:a kiss sth↔away
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g eid="kiss_pvg_1"><top-g><pv-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-2403" eid="kiss_pv_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addpv:13cbabf992f.-2403">●</xhtml:a></xsymb><pv e_id="13cbabf992f.-2403" eid="kiss_pv_1"><xhtml:a href="xp:kiss">ˌkiss</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xp:sth↔away">sth↔aˈway</xhtml:a></pv></pv-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kiss_sngs_6"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="kiss_sng_7" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:stop">stop</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="help:sb">sb</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:feeling">feeling</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:sad">sad</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:angry">angry</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:by">by</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:kissing">kissing</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:them">them</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>以吻消除（某人的悲伤或怒气）</chn></def><x-gs eid="kiss_xgs_5"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-23fe" eid="kiss_xg_9"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabf992f.-23fe">◆</xhtml:a></xsymb><rx e eid="kiss_rxg_9" g href="kiss_rxg_9" resource="recx" source="ald9" targeteltid="13cba888321.1b1d"><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.1f34c209.141c12ef5c9.63b1" eid="kiss_x_9" status="6" tranid="17" wd="He kissed away her tears."><xhtml:a href="x:He">He</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:kissed">kissed</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:away">away</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:her">her</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:tears">tears</xhtml:a>.  <xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>他吻了吻她，她就不哭了。</chn></x><a href="snd://_kiss__gbs_8.spx"><audio-gb-liju>🔊</audio-gb-liju></a><xaudio eid="kiss_xaudio_18" geo="n_am" name="_kiss__ams_8"></xaudio></rx-g></x-g-blk></x-gs></sn-g></sn-blk></sn-gs></pv-g><div class="seealso">See also <a href="entry://kiss">kiss</a></div>
</>
kist
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g new="y"><top-g> <h kit

eid="equipment_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e93"><body eid="equipment_body_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e92"><title eid="equipment_h1_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e91" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="24" status="1">equipment</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">material</und> ◇ <und margined="n">gear</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kit</und> ◇ <und margined="n">apparatus</und></inlinelist><p eid="equipment_p_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li eid="equipment_li_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e89" e_inline="y"><unsyn>equipment</unsyn> <und margined="n">the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定目的或活动所需的设备、器材</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_3" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e87"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_5"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e85" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">camping equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>野营装备</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_6"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e83" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a piece of equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一件设备</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e82" e_inline="y"><unsyn>material</unsyn> <und margined="n">things that are needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">household cleaning materials<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>家用清洁剂</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">breathing apparatus for firefighters<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消防员用的呼吸器</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e60"><li eid="equipment_li_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e5f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>electrical/electronic</eb>  equipment/gear/apparatus</und></li><li eid="equipment_li_11" href="xi:kith">kith</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:and">and</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="xi:kin">kin</xhtml:a></idm></idm-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="kith_sngs_1"><sn-blk><sn-g eid="kith_sng_1" n=""><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-2187" reg="oldfash"><xhtml:a href="helpr:oldfash">old-fashioned</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:friends">friends</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:and">and</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:relatives">relatives</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>亲戚朋友</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk><unbox type="synonyms" Name="equipment" eid="equipment_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e93"><body eid="equipment_body_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e92"><title eid="equipment_h1_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e91" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="24" status="1">equipment</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">material</und> ◇ <und margined="n">gear</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kit</und> ◇ <und margined="n">apparatus</und></inlinelist><p eid="equipment_p_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li eid="equipment_li_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e89" e_inline="y"><unsyn>equipment</unsyn> <und margined="n">the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定目的或活动所需的设备、器材</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_3" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e87"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_5"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e85" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">camping equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>野营装备</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_6"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e83" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a piece of equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一件设备</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e82" e_inline="y"><unsyn>material</unsyn> <und margined="n">things that are needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">household cleaning materials<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>家用清洁剂</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">breathing apparatus for firefighters<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消防员用的呼吸器</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e60"><li eid="equipment_li_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e5f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>electrical/electronic</eb>  equipment/gear/apparatus</und></li><li eid="equipment_li_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e5d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>sports</eb>  equipment/gear/kit</und></li><li eid="equipment_li_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e5b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>camping</eb>  equipment/gear</und></li><li eid="equipment_li_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e59" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a  <eb>piece of</eb>  equipment/apparatus</und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-gs></idm-g></idm-gs></idm-gs-blk></h-g>

kith and kin

eid="crime_unbox_1" name="Crime" type="colloc"><body e_id="13cbabc0139.6b71" eid="crime_body_1"><title e_id="13cbabc0139.6b72" e_inline="y" eid="crime_h1_1"><titled status="2" tranid="34">Crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪</chn></titled></title><h2 e_id="13cbabc0139.6b73" e_inline="y" eid="crime_h2_1" status="6" tranid="1">Committing a crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪</chn></h2><ul class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b74" eid="crime_ul_1"><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b75" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_1"><und margined="n"> <eb>commit</eb>  a crime/a murder/a violent assault/a brutal killing/an armed robbery/fraud<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>犯罪／谋杀罪／暴力侵犯他人身体罪／残杀罪／持械抢劫罪／诈骗罪</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b77" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_2"><und margined="n"> <eb>be involved in</eb>  terrorism/a suspected arson attack/people smuggling/human trafficking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>参与恐怖主义活动；涉嫌纵火袭击；参与人口走私／人口贩卖</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b79" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_3"><und margined="n"> <eb>engage/participate in</eb>  criminal activity/illegal practices/acts of mindless vandalism<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>参与犯罪活动／非法活动／愚昧的故意毁坏他人财产的行为</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b7b" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_4"><und margined="n"> <eb>steal</eb>  sb's wallet/purse/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> mobile phone/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> cell phone<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>偷某人的钱包／手机</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b81" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_5"><und margined="n"> <eb>rob</eb>  a bank/a person/a tourist<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>抢劫银行／他人／游客</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b83" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_6"><und margined="n"> <eb>break into/</eb> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> <eb>burgle/</eb> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> <eb>burglarize</eb>  a house/a home/an apartment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>入室盗窃</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8b" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_7"><und margined="n"> <eb>hijack</eb>  a plane/ship/bus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>劫持飞机／轮船／公共汽车</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8d" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_8"><und margined="n"> <eb>smuggle</eb>  drugs/weapons/arms/immigrants<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>走私毒品／武器／军火；偷运移民</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b8f" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_9"><und margined="n"> <eb>launder</eb>  drug money (through sth)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>（通过…）洗毒资</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b91" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_10"><und margined="n"> <eb>forge </eb>  documents/certificates/passports<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>伪造文件／证件／护照</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b93" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_11"><und margined="n"> <eb>take/accept/pay sb/offer (sb)</eb>  a bribe<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>索取／收受贿赂；向（某人）行贿</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b95" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_12"><und margined="n"> <eb>run</eb>  a phishing/an email/an Internet scam<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>进行网络钓鱼／电子邮件／互联网诈骗</chn></und></li></ul><h2 e_id="13cbabc0139.6b97" e_inline="y" eid="crime_h2_2" status="6" tranid="14">Fighting crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>打击犯罪</chn></h2><ul class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6b98" eid="crime_ul_2"><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b99" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_13"><und margined="n"> <eb>combat/fight</eb>  crime/terrorism/corruption/drug trafficking<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>打击犯罪／恐怖主义／腐败／贩毒</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9b" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_14"><und margined="n"> <eb>prevent/stop</eb>  credit-card fraud/child abuse/software piracy<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>防止／阻止信用卡诈骗／虐待儿童／软件盗版</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9d" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_15"><und margined="n"> <eb>deter/stop</eb>  criminals/burglars/thieves/shoplifters/vandals<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>威慑／阻止犯罪分子／入室盗窃者／小偷／商店扒手／故意破坏公物者</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6b9f" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_16"><und margined="n"> <eb>reduce/tackle/crack down on</eb>  knife/gun/violent/street crime/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> antisocial behaviour<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>减少／处理／严厉打击持刀／持枪／暴力／街头犯罪／反社会行为</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba3" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_17"><und margined="n"> <eb>foil</eb>  a bank raid/a terrorist plot<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>挫败一起银行抢劫案／一次恐怖分子的阴谋</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba5" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_18"><und margined="n"> <eb>help/support/protect </eb>  the victims of crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>帮助／支持／保护犯罪活动的受害者</chn></und></li></ul><h2 e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba7" e_inline="y" eid="crime_h2_3" status="6" tranid="21">Investigating crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>调查犯罪活动</chn></h2><ul class="bullet" e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba8" eid="crime_ul_3"><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6ba9" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_19"><und margined="n"> <eb>report</eb>  a crime/a theft/a rape/an attack/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> an incident to the police<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>向警方举报不法行为／偷窃案／强奸案／袭击事件／暴力事件</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bad" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_20"><und margined="n"> <eb>witness</eb>  the crime/attack/murder/incident<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>目击犯罪／袭击／谋杀／暴力事件</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6baf" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_21"><und margined="n"> <eb>investigate</eb>  a murder/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="n_am"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:am"><namelabel>NAmE</namelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a homicide/a burglary/a robbery/the alleged incident<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>调查谋杀案／蓄意杀人案／入室盗窃案／抢劫案／涉嫌的暴力事件</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bb3" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_22"><und margined="n"> <eb>conduct/launch/pursue</eb>  an investigation (into…)/<label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><q>especially</q> <xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a police/murder inquiry<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>进行／开始／继续（对…的）调查／警方调查／谋杀案调查</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bb7" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_"><und margined="n"> <eb>investigate/reopen</eb>  a criminal/murder case<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>调查／重新审理犯罪／谋杀案件</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bb9" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_24"><und margined="n"> <eb>examine/investigate/find fingerprints at</eb>  the crime scene/the scene of crime<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>仔细检查／调查／查找犯罪现场的指纹</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bbb" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_25"><und margined="n"> <eb>collect/gather</eb>  forensic evidence<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>收集法医证据</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bbd" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_26"><und margined="n"> <eb>uncover</eb>  new evidence/a fraud/a scam/a plot/a conspiracy/political corruption/a cache of weapons<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>发现新证据／诈骗／欺诈／密谋／阴谋／政治腐败／私藏武器</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bbf" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_27"><und margined="n"> <eb>describe/identify</eb>  a suspect/the culprit/the perpetrator/the assailant/the attacker<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>描述／指认嫌疑犯／罪犯／作恶者／攻击者／袭击者</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bc1" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_28"><und margined="n"> <eb>question/interrogate</eb>  a suspect/witness<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>询问嫌疑人／目击证人</chn></und></li><li e_id="13cbabc0139.6bc3" e_inline="y" eid="crime_li_29"><und margined="n"> <eb>solve/crack</eb>  the case<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>破案</chn></und></li></ul><xr-gs xt="collocat"><xrhead> <arrow>➡</arrow> <xrbold><b>collocations</b></xrbold> at</xrhead><xr-g-blk><xr-g> <xh><xhtml:a href="xid:13cbabf992f.-486c">justice</xhtml:a></xh></xr-g></xr-g-blk></xr-gs></body></unbox></sn-gs></idm-g><div class="seealso">See also <a kiwi fruit
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g <head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="km_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-1f9e">km</h><pos-g eid="km_posg_1"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:abbr">abbreviation</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g><if-gs-blk> (<if-gs><if-g-blk><form><xhtml:a href="helpil:pl">plural</xhtml:a> </form><if-g><if-blk><if e_id="13cbabf992f.-1f99">km</if></if-blk></if-g></if-g-blk><if-g-blk> or <form></form><if-g><if-blk><if e_id="13cbabf992f.-1f97">kms</if></if-blk></if-g></if-g-blk></if-gs>) </if-gs-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="km_sngs_1"><sn-blk-nolist><sn-g eid="km_sng_1"><use-blk e_id="" noblk="y"> (<use><xhtml:a href="d:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:writing">writing</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>书写形式</chn></use>) </use-blk><def neh="n" noblk="n"><xhtml:a href="d:kilometre">kilometre</xhtml:a>(<xhtml:a href="d:s">s</xhtml:a>)<chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>千米；公里</chn></def></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs></h-g>
</>
knack

eid="equipment_p_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li eid="equipment_li_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e89" e_inline="y"><unsyn>equipment</unsyn> <und margined="n">the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定目的或活动所需的设备、器材</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_3" activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">breathing apparatus for firefighters<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消防员用的呼吸器</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e5d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>sports</eb>  equipment/gear/kit</und></li><li eid="equipment_li_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e5b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>camping</eb>  equipment/gear</und></li><li eid="equipment_li_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e59" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">a  <eb>piece of</eb> eid="equipment_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e93"><body eid="equipment_body_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e92"><title eid="equipment_h1_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e91" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="24" status="1">equipment</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">material</und> ◇ <und margined="n">gear</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kit</und> ◇ <und margined="n">apparatus</und></inlinelist><p eid="equipment_p_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li eid="equipment_li_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e89" e_inline="y"><unsyn>equipment</unsyn> <und margined="n">the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定目的或活动所需的设备、器材</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_3" </chnsep><chn>野营装备</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_6"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e83" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a piece of equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一件设备</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e82" e_inline="y"><unsyn>material</unsyn> <und margined="n">things that are needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">household cleaning materials<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>家用清洁剂</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">breathing apparatus for firefighters<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消防员用的呼吸器</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" kneecap

knee-deep

<xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:your">your</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:knees">knees</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>没膝的；齐膝深的</chn></def><x-gs eid="kneedeep_xgs_1"><x-g-blk e_id="13cbabf992f.-1d79" eid="kneedeep_xg_1"><xsymb><xhtml:a href="addexample:13cbabf992f.-1d79">◆</xhtml:a></xsymb><rx e eid="kneedeep_rxg_1" g href="kneedeep_rxg_1" resource="recx" source="ald9" targeteltid="13cba888321.1bc9"><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.1f34c209.141c12ef5c9.6482" eid="kneedeep_x_1" status="6" tranid="2" wd="The snow was knee-deep in places."><xhtml:a href="x:The">The</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:snow">snow</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:was">was</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:knee">knee</xhtml:a>-<xhtml:a href="x:deep">deep</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:in">in</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="x:places">places</xhtml:a>.  <xhtml:br></xhtml:br><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>有些地方的雪已齐膝深了。</chn></x><a eid="equipment_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e93"><body eid="equipment_body_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e92"><title eid="equipment_h1_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e91" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="24" status="1">equipment</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">material</und> ◇ <und margined="n">gear</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kit</und> ◇ <und margined="n">apparatus</und></inlinelist><p eid="equipment_p_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li eid="equipment_li_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e89" e_inline="y"><unsyn>equipment</unsyn> <und margined="n">the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定目的或活动所需的设备、器材</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_3" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e87"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_5"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e85" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">camping equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>野营装备</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_6"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e83" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a piece of equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一件设备</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e82" e_inline="y"><unsyn>material</unsyn> <und margined="n">things that are needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">household cleaning materials<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>家用清洁剂</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66"
