e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" knick-knack
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="knickknack_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-1c28">knick-knack</h><topic e_id="13cbabf992f.-1c27" eid="knickknack_topic_1" l1="Houses and buildings" l2="Houses" l3="Interior href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈnɪk næk</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="knickknack_audio_1" name="knick_knack#1_gb_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈnɪk næk</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="knickknack_audio_2" name="knick_knack#1_us_1"></audio></xhtml:a></pron-g> <a href="snd://knick_knack_1_us_1.spx"><audio-us>🔊</audio-us></a></pron-g-blk></pron-gs><pos-g eid="knickknack_posg_1"> <pos-blk><pos><xhtml:a href="helpp:n">noun</xhtml:a></pos></pos-blk></pos-g><res-g eid="knickknack_resg_1"></res-g><gram-g eid="knickknack_gramg_1"><gram-blk> [<gram><xhtml:a href="helpgr:usupl">usually plural</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk> (<label-g><reg-blk><q>sometimes</q> <reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-1c17" reg="disappro"><xhtml:a href="helpr:disappro">disapproving</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk></top-g><sn-gs eid="knickknack_sngs_1"><sn-blk-nolist><sn-g eid="knickknack_sng_1"><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:a">a</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:small">small</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a </chnsep><chn><fthzmark></fthzmark>（房子里的）小装饰物，小摆设</chn></def><xr-gs firstinblock="n" xt="syn"><xrlabel> <xhtml:a href="helpxr:syn"><boxtag>SYN</boxtag></xhtml:a> </xrlabel><xr-g-blk><xr-g for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und eid="equipment_unbox_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e93"><body eid="equipment_body_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e92"><title eid="equipment_h1_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e91" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="24" status="1">equipment</titled></title><inlinelist><und margined="n">material</und> ◇ <und margined="n">gear</und> ◇ <und margined="n">kit</und> ◇ <und margined="n">apparatus</und></inlinelist><p eid="equipment_p_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These are all words for the things that you need for a particular purpose or activity.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均指特定目的或活动所需的材料、设备、器材。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e8a"><li eid="equipment_li_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e89" e_inline="y"><unsyn>equipment</unsyn> <und margined="n">the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定目的或活动所需的设备、器材</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_3" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e87"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_5"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e85" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">camping equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>野营装备</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_6"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e83" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a piece of equipment<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一件设备</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e82" e_inline="y"><unsyn>material</unsyn> <und margined="n">things that are needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">household cleaning materials<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>家用清洁剂</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">breathing apparatus for firefighters<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消防员用的呼吸器</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" knitting
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="knitting_hg_1"><top-g> <hkey><xhtml:a href="help:keyword"><symbol type="key">🔑</symbol></xhtml:a></hkey> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-19db">knit·ting</h><pron e eid="knitting_prongs_1" gs href="knitting_prongs_1" href="help:name">NAmE</xhtml:a></namelabel> <pron-g><xhtml:a href="help:phonetics"><phon-blk>/<phon>ˈnɪtɪŋ</phon>/</phon-blk><audio eid="knitting_audio_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e82" e_inline="y"><unsyn>material</unsyn> <und margined="n">things that are needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动所需的材料</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_4" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e80"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_7"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7e" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">household cleaning materials<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>家用清洁剂</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_8"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7c" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">teaching material<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>教学材料</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_1" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7b" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">equipment or material?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用 equipment 还是 material？</chn></h3><p eid="equipment_p_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e7a" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Equipment</eb>  is usually solid things, especially large ones.  <eb>Materials</eb>  may be liquids, powders or books, CDs, etc. containing information, as well as small solid items.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>equipment 通常指固体材料，尤其是大型设备器材；material 除指小型固体材料外，还可指液体、粉末、书籍、信息光盘等。</chn></und></p><ul eid="equipment_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e77"><li eid="equipment_li_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e76" e_inline="y"><unsyn>gear</unsyn> <und margined="n">the equipment or clothes needed for a particular activity<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指某种活动所需的设备、用具、衣服</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_5" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e74"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_9"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e72" e_inline="y" tranID="15" status="6">Skiing gear can be expensive.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>滑雪装备有时会很昂贵。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_8" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e71" e_inline="y"><unsyn>kit</unsyn> <und margined="n">a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指用于特定目的的成套工具、成套设备</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_6" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6f"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_10"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_10" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6d" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">a first-aid kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套急救用品</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_11"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_11" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6b" e_inline="y" tranID="19" status="6">a tool kit<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>一套工具</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="equipment_li_9" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e6a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>apparatus</unsyn> <und margined="n">the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指特定活动或任务所需的仪器、器械、装置</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="equipment_xgs_7" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e68"><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_12"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_12" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e66" e_inline="y" tranID="21" status="6">breathing apparatus for firefighters<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>消防员用的呼吸器</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="equipment_xg_13"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="equipment_x_13" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e64" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">laboratory apparatus<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>实验室仪器</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y"/><un un="note" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e63"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Apparatus</eb>  is used especially for scientific, medical or technical purposes.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>apparatus 尤具有科学、医学或技术等方面的用途。</chn></und></un></li></ul><h3 eid="equipment_h3_2" e_id="13cbabd5a4a.-2e61" e_inline="y" tranID="31" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="equipment_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabeaa27.2473" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">These words all mean to come against sth with a lot of force.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均含用力撞击、击打之义。</chn></und></p><ul eid="hit_ul_2" shcut="n"><xhtml:ol start="3"><xhtml:li><licontent><sn-g eid="knocker_sng_3" n=""><v-gs-blk type="alt"><v-gs><v-g-blk><v-g><v-blk><v e_id="13cbabf992f.-15fc"><xhtml:a </gram-blk></gram-g><label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-15f8" reg="taboo"><xhtml:a href="helpr:taboo">taboo</xhtml:a></reg>, </reg-blk><reg-blk><reg e_id="13cbabf992f.-15f7" </>

knocking shop
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="knockingshop_hg_1"><top-g> <h e_id="13cbabf992f.-15e2">knocking shop</h><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-15e0"></infl><infl e_id="13cbabf992f.-15df"></infl><pron-gs eid="knockingshop_prongs_1" knock sb back sth
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-17c2" knock sth on the head

<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><pv-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-174c" knock up

eid="hit_xg_41"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="hit_x_41" e_id="13cbabeaa27.2479" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">The boy was hit by a speeding car.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>男孩被超速行驶的汽车撞倒了。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="hit_li_7" e_id="13cbabeaa27.247a" e_inline="y"><unsyn>knock</unsyn> <und margined="n">to hit sth so that it moves or breaks; to put sb/sth into a particular state or position by hitting them/it<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指打掉、敲动、打破、撞成…</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="hit_xgs_26" e_id="13cbabeaa27.247c"><x-g-blk eid="hit_xg_42"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40a5"><body e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40a6"><title e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40a7" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="1" status="3">Saying that you don't know something or giving yourself time to think<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>表示不知道或需要想一想</chn></titled></title><p e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40a9" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">There are various ways of telling people that you haven't got the information they are asking for.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>告诉别人你不知道他们想要了解的信息，有多种方式</chn>：</und></p><ul e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40a8" class="bullet"><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40ab"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40ad" e_inline="y" tranID="3" status="2"> <ebi>I really don't know.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我确实不知道。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40b0"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40b2" e_inline="y" tranID="4" status="3"> <ebi>I'm afraid I don't have the faintest idea.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>很抱歉，我一点都不知道。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40b5"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40b7" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="2"> <ebi>Sorry, I have absolutely no idea.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>对不起，我完全不知道。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40b9"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40bb" e_inline="y" tranID="6" status="3">Has anyone left a message? <ebi>No, not to my knowledge/not as far as I know.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>有谁留过言吗？没有，据我所知没有。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40be"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40c0" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="2"> <ebi>Well, that's a good question.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>嗯，这是一个很好的问题。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40c3"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40c5" e_inline="y" tranID="8" status="3"> <ebi>Yes, that's an interesting point/idea.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>是的，这观点很有意思。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40c8"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40ca" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="2"> <ebi>Well, let me see…</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>好吧，让我想一想…</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40cd"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-37641f80.142d74281a8.40cf" e_inline="y" tranID="10" status="2"> <ebi>Let me think about that for a moment.</ebi> <chnsep> </chnsep><chn>让我想一下。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul></body></unbox><xr-gs firstinblock="n" xt="see"><xrlabel> <xhtml:a href="helpxr:see"> <arrow>➡</arrow>  see also</xhtml:a> </xrlabel><xr-g-blk><xr-g e_targeteltid="13cbac08c92.62ec"><xh-blk><xh><a href="entry://need-to-know">need-to-know</a></xh></xh-blk></xr-g></xr-g-blk> </xr-gs><unbox type="express" Name="Asking for information" eid="" e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7de8"><body e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7de9"><title e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7dea" e_inline="y"><titled tranID="1" status="2">Asking for information<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>询问信息</chn></titled></title><p e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7dec" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">When you want to find something out, it sounds more polite if you can phrase your questions in an indirect way.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>用间接的方式询问所需的信息听起来更礼貌</chn>：</und></p><ul e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7deb" class="bullet"><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7dee"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7df0" e_inline="y" tranID="3" status="2"> <ebi>Could you tell me</ebi> the best way to get to Paddington station, please?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>您能告诉我去帕丁顿车站的最佳路线吗？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7df3"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7df5" e_inline="y" tranID="4" status="3"> <ebi>Do you happen to know</ebi> whether Amy Brown works here?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>你可知道艾米 · 布朗是否在这里工作？</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li nobullet="y"><x-gs e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7df8"><x-g-blk eid=""><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="u4cdebea65f7df6b4.-51b21c88.142c2eaca6b.7dfa" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="3"> <ebi>I wonder whether/if you can help me. I'm trying to find out</ebi> which number to call for reservations.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>不知道您能否帮帮我，我想知道打哪个号码可以预订。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-g></licontent></xhtml:li></xhtml:ol></sn-blk></sn-gs><sn-gs eid="know_sngs_2"><shcut-blk><sdsymb><xhtml:a href="help:sd">➤</xhtml:a></sdsymb><shcut><xhtml:a href="d:realize">realize</xhtml:a><chnsep> </chnsep><chn>意识到</chn></shcut></shcut-blk><sn-blk shcut="y"><xhtml:ol start="2"><xhtml:li><licontent><xhtml:a href="help:keypart"><symbol type="key">🔑</symbol></xhtml:a> <sn-g eid="know_sng_2" n=""><gram-g eid="know_gramg_2"><gram-blk> [<gram><xhtml:a href="helpgr:t">transitive</xhtml:a></gram></gram-blk><gram-blk>, <gram><xhtml:a href="helpgr:i">intransitive</xhtml:a></gram>] </gram-blk></gram-g><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:realize">realize</xhtml:a>, <xhtml:a href="d:understand">understand</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:be">be</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a eid="identify_p_1" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a4"><und margined="n">These words all mean to be able to see or hear sb/sth and especially to be able to say who or what they are.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均含认出、辨别出之义。</chn></und></p><ul eid="identify_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a3"><li eid="identify_li_5" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a2"><unsyn>identify</unsyn> <und margined="n">to be able to say who or what sb/sth is<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指确认、认出、鉴定</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_8" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a0"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_14"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629d"><unsyn>know</unsyn> <und margined="n">to be able to say who or what sth is when you see or hear it because you have seen or heard it before<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指能认出、能辨认出</chn></und><un un="note" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629b"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Know</eb>  is used especially to talk about sounds that seem familiar and when sb recognizes the quality or opportunity that sb/sth represents.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>know 尤指认出熟悉的声音、辨别出人或事物所表现出的特质以及发现机会</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_9" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6299"><x-g-blk </chnsep><chn>我看不到谁在讲话，但我能辨别出声音。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_16"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_16" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6295" tranID="24" status="6">She knows a bargain when she sees one.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>她一看就知道有没有便宜可捡。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="identify_li_7" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6294"><unsyn>recognize</unsyn> <und margined="n">to know who sb is or what sth is when you see or hear them/it, because you have seen or heard them/it before<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指认识、认出、辨别出</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_10" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6292"><x-g-blk who/what they are<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指能说出…的名称、叫出…的名字</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_11" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-628d"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_18"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_18" darkness.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>黑暗中我只看出了一个人的轮廓。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="identify_h3_1" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6285" tranID="40" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="identify_ul_3" </chnsep><chn>以上各词均含认出、辨别出之义。</chn></und></p><ul eid="identify_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a3"><li eid="identify_li_5" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a2"><unsyn>identify</unsyn> <und margined="n">to be able to say who or what sb/sth is<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指确认、认出、鉴定</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_8" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a0"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_14"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_14" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629e" tranID="5" status="6">She was able to identify her attacker.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>她认出了袭击她的人。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="identify_li_6" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629d"><unsyn>know</unsyn> <und margined="n">to be able to say who or what sth is when you see or hear it because you have seen or heard it before<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指能认出、能辨认出</chn></und><un un="note" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629b"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Know</eb>  is used especially to talk about sounds that seem familiar and when sb recognizes the quality or opportunity that sb/sth represents.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>know 尤指认出熟悉的声音、辨别出人或事物所表现出的特质以及发现机会</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_9" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6299"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_15"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_15" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6297" tranID="23" status="6">I couldn't see who was speaking, but I knew the voice.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>我看不到谁在讲话，但我能辨别出声音。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_16"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_16" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6295" tranID="24" status="6">She knows a bargain when she sees one.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>她一看就知道有没有便宜可捡。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></un></li><li eid="identify_li_7" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6294"><unsyn>recognize</unsyn> <und margined="n">to know who sb is or what sth is when you see or hear them/it, because you have seen or heard them/it before<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指认识、认出、辨别出</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_10" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6292"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_17"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_17" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6290" tranID="7" status="6">I recognized him as soon as he came in the room.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>他一进屋我就认出了他。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="identify_li_8" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-628f"><unsyn>name</unsyn> <und margined="n">to say the name of sb/sth in order to show that you know who/what they are<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指能说出…的名称、叫出…的名字</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_11" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-628d"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_18"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_18" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-628b" tranID="26" status="6">The victim has not yet been named.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>受害人的姓名仍未得知。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="identify_li_9" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-628a"><unsyn>make sb/sth out</unsyn> <und margined="n">to manage to see or hear sb/sth that is not very clear<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指看清、听清、分清、辨认清楚</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_12" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6288"><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_19"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_19" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6286" tranID="9" status="6">I could just make out a figure in the darkness.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>黑暗中我只看出了一个人的轮廓。</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="identify_h3_1" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6285" tranID="40" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="identify_ul_3" class="bullet" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6284"><li eid="identify_li_10" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6283"><und margined="n">to identify/know/recognize sb/sth  <eb>by</eb>  sth</und></li><li eid="identify_li_11" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6281"><und margined="n">to identify/recognize/name sb/sth  <eb>as</eb>  sb/sth</und></li><li eid="identify_li_12" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-627f"><und margined="n">to identify/know/recognize/make out  <eb>who/what/how…</eb> </und></li><li eid="identify_li_13" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-627d"><und margined="n">to  <eb>easily/barely/just</eb>  identify/recognize/make out sb/sth</und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-gs><idm-gs-blk><boxblock><xhtml:a href="help:id"><img src="idioms.svg"></xhtml:a></boxblock><idm-gs eid="know_idmgs_1"><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-1323" know best

know different/otherwise

know-it-all
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g know/learn/find sth to your cost

know sb by sight

know sb in the biblical sense

know sb/sth like the back of your hand

know sth as well as I do
<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><idm-g e_id="13cbabf992f.-12d2" know what you're talking about

know your own mind

know your way around

Knoxville

knuckle

eid="identify_p_1" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a4"><und margined="n">These words all mean to be able to see or hear sb/sth and especially to be able to say who or what they are.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>以上各词均含认出、辨别出之义。</chn></und></p><ul eid="identify_ul_2" class="deflist" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a3"><li eid="identify_li_5" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-62a2"><unsyn>identify</unsyn> <und e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629d"><unsyn>know</unsyn> <und margined="n">to be able to say who or what sth is when you see or hear it because you have seen or heard it before<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>指能认出、能辨认出</chn></und><un un="note" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-629b"> <boxtag>NOTE</boxtag> <und margined="n"> <eb>Know</eb>  is used especially to talk about sounds that seem familiar and when sb recognizes the quality or opportunity that sb/sth represents.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>know 尤指认出熟悉的声音、辨别出人或事物所表现出的特质以及发现机会</chn>：</und><x-gs eid="identify_xgs_9" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6299"><x-g-blk </chnsep><chn>我看不到谁在讲话，但我能辨别出声音。</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="identify_xg_16"><xsymb>◆</xsymb><x eid="identify_x_16" e_id="13cbabf24c9.-6295" tranID="24" status="6">She knows a bargain when she knuckle down (to sth)
